meta.title: ScanEasy — Scan documents. Simply.
meta.description: ScanEasy is the easiest way to scan documents with your iPhone. Free, private, offline.

autoDetect.title: Auto-Detection
autoDetect.desc: Point your camera — ScanEasy detects the document automatically and captures it.

private.title: 100% Private
private.desc: No servers, no cloud, no tracking. Everything stays on your iPhone.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.desc: Scan, crop, share as PDF — in under 3 seconds.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.paragraph: ScanEasy ("the App") is a document scanner app for iOS. Your privacy matters to us. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and how we handle it.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.html: We do not collect any personal data. ScanEasy processes all data exclusively on your device:
dataCollection.item0: Camera: Used solely for scanning documents. Images are processed locally and never transmitted to any server.
dataCollection.item1: Photo Library: Accessed only when you import images from your gallery. We only read the images you select.
dataCollection.item2: Scanned Documents: Remain exclusively on your device. We have no access to them.

noServers.title: 3. No Servers, No Cloud
noServers.paragraph: ScanEasy does not operate any servers and does not use any cloud services. All scanning, recognition, and processing features run 100% on your iPhone.

thirdParties.title: 4. Third Parties
thirdParties.paragraph: The App does not use any third-party analytics, tracking, or advertising services. No data is shared with third parties.

appleServices.title: 5. Apple Services
appleServices.html: When using the App through the App Store, Apple's Privacy Policy also applies. Apple may collect anonymized usage data (e.g., app crashes) if you have consented to this in your device settings.

permissions.title: 6. Permissions
permissions.paragraph: You can revoke permissions at any time in iOS Settings.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.paragraph: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be published on this page.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.html: Questions about privacy? Write to us: easyscan-support@rooki.xyz

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance
acceptance.paragraph: By using ScanEasy ("the App"), you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the App.

use.title: 2. Use of the App
use.paragraph: ScanEasy is a free document scanner app for iOS. You may use the App for personal and commercial purposes. You are solely responsible for ensuring that you use scanned documents lawfully.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph: The App, including its design, code, and content, is protected by copyright. You may not copy, modify, decompile, or otherwise reverse-engineer the App.

yourContent.title: 4. Your Content
yourContent.paragraph: All documents you scan with ScanEasy belong to you. We do not claim any rights to your scanned content. Since all data remains locally on your device, you are responsible for backing it up.

availability.title: 5. Availability
availability.paragraph: We strive to keep the App functional but cannot guarantee uninterrupted availability. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the App at any time.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.p0: The App is provided "as is." We make no warranties regarding the completeness, accuracy, or quality of scan results. The App is not a substitute for professional digitization services.
disclaimer.p1: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the App.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.paragraph: We may change these Terms of Service at any time. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.paragraph: German law applies. Place of jurisdiction is Germany.
